name: Jessica - Military Style Girls Hat
description:
Jessica is an adorable black military style cap adorned with a shimmery bright pink flower.  

The flower can be permanently attached to the hat or to a clip (gator clip or bobby pin whichever you prefer)

My hats and flowers are all handmade by me in a pet free and smoke free environment!

*Color may vary slightly from picture.  This hat is a size 20.

name: MiliB Blue w/Sheer Off-White Flower
description:
MiliB hats are a spin off from the popular Newsboy and Military style hats. Combining the Chicness of both styles into one hat.

MiliB Blue is made of a blue levi patch pattern fabric on the outside and is lined with a blue floral print cotton.

The brim contains Buckram for a gentle stiffness.

This MiliB Blue is adorned with an adorable flower made of off-white sheer fabric and blue light-weight fabric for the center. This flower is hand stitched to the hat and no glue was used.

Size: Select size below

(To determine your head size measure around your head just above your eyebrows where you would like the hat to sit. You want a hat size that is the same size as that measurement or a little bigger.)

Each MiliB is hand stitched by me in a smoke free and pet free environment.

Go out and make your fashion statement with your new HanuChic MiliB Hat!!!


Care Instructions:
Hand Wash or Spot Wash Only
Lay Flat to Dry

Made in the USA

name: Saydee - Military Style Ladies Hat
description:
This black and white beauty will add that last touch to complete your casual yet stylish outfit.

This hat has a little extra stretch to make for a nice snug fit.

The flower is made from fabric hand cut by me and with a little added silver flair this cutie is bound to be a hit at any social. Flower can be permanently attached or can be attached to a bobby pin/ gater clip for customization.

Saydee is a perfect fit for hat size 22.

Care Instructions:

If flower is permanently attached then spot clean and air dry.

If flower is detachable then remove flower and wash in warm water.  Form hat to shape and let air dry.

Do not use bleach.

name: MiliB Cream
description:
MiliB hats are a spin off from the popular Newsboy and Military style hats. Combining the Chicness of both styles into one hat.

MiliB Cream is made of a cream corduroy fabric.

The brim contains crinoline for a gentle stiffness.

MiliB Cream is adorned with an adorable flower made of light maroon fabric hand cut to look like petals and a silver button for the center. It is trimmed with a furry cream yarn and green canvas fabric for the leaves.

Size: 22

(To determine your head size measure around your head just above your eyebrows where you would like the hat to sit. You want a hat size that is the same size as that measurement or a little bigger.)

Each MiliB is hand stitched by me in a smoke free and pet free environment.

Go out and make your fashion statement with your new HanuChic MiliB Hat!!!


Care Instructions:
Hand Wash or Spot Wash Only
Lay Flat to Dry 

Made in America

name: Custom MiliB Hat
description:
MiliB hats are a spin off from the popular Newsboy and Military style hats. Combining the Chicness of both styles into one hat.

This listing is for a custom MiliB Hat using your choice* of fabric or one of the following fabrics: (see pictures for samples)

Denim Rose
Denim Blue
Bright Blue
Pink & Green Stripe
Party Dots
Bright Blue Eyelet
Cream Eyelet
Pastel Green
Teal and Brown Plaid
Pink Flower Patch
Blue Confetti
Blue with Mult-Flowers
Teal and Brown Floral
Brown and Brown Dots
White with Black Diamonds
Black with Red Flowers
or other fabrics at my discretion. 

*Fabric choice is subject to availability
**Fabric colors may vary slightly from the pictures provided

Embellishment:  Using the fabrics listed above or of your choice I will create a flower to adorn your hat.  I usually try to coordinate the flower with the lining of the hat.  You are welcome to look at my current and past listings for ideas.  If you have a specific look in mind you are welcome to send me a picture or a link to the picture and I'll do my best to recreate the flower for you.

Size: Whatever size you need

(To determine your head size measure around your head just above your eyebrows where you would like the hat to sit. You want a hat size that is the same size as that measurement or a little bigger.)

****After purchase I will send you my custom order form by e-mail.****

Each MiliB is hand stitched by me in a smoke free and pet free environment.

Go out and make your fashion statement with your new custom HanuChic MiliB Hat!!!

Care Instructions:
Gently Hand Wash or Spot Wash Only
Lay Flat to Dry

Made in America
